name: automation-project
description: Full-stack automation project with React frontend, Node.js service, and Python service

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:node" "npm run dev:python"
scripts.test: concurrently "npm run test:frontend" "npm run test:node" "npm run test:python"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../node-service && npm install && cd ../python-service && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.format: concurrently "cd frontend && prettier --write src/" "cd node-service && npm run format"
